name: Mental Health Services
description: Short term solution focused group & individual counseling, case management, medication management, information, & referrals. Available for children, youth, and adults.
fullDescription: Short term solution focused group & individual counseling, case management, medication management, information, & referrals. Available for children, youth, and adults.
whatTheyOffer: Short term solution focused group & individual counseling, case management, medication management, information, & referrals. Available for children, youth, and adults.
howToGetIt: Contact by phone for appointments, or drop-in hours are Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday, 9:45am - 11:00am. For more information call: (415) 452-2200.
cost: Sliding scale based on income (credit card/cash) Medi-Cal, Medicare and private insurance accepted (with preauthorization from carrier).
agency: OMI Family Center - Counseling and Mental Health Support
